data.name: Beyond your Fear
data.detailed_description:
Beyond your Fear is a Psychological choice matter horror.

Featuring:

Puzzle Solving
Game has variety of riddles .Almost every riddle is unique. Solving them helps player to unveil the mysterious force that holds him.

Atmospheric Investigation
Game features detective storytelling which gives player the ability to figure out what is happening on their own. Using clue system players will progress through story.

What lies beyond your Fear?
At the End of the game Players will answer this question by themselves.

data.short_description: Descend into atmospheric Psychological horror game where player needs to solve riddles and make hard choices on the way to realize what lies beyond your fear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-bit Windows 8 / 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB / Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-bit Windows 8 / 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
